classRec.name: JSONTokenType
classRec.description: Class containing constant values for the different types of tokens in a JSON encoded string.

method.name: JSONDecoder
method.description:
Constructs a new JSONDecoder to parse a JSON string
into a native object.
method.param:
s The JSON string to be converted
into a native object

strict Flag indicating if the JSON string needs to
strictly match the JSON standard or not.

method.name: checkValidToken
method.description: Verifies that the token is valid.

method.name: getValue
method.description:
Gets the internal object that was created by parsing
the JSON string passed to the constructor.
method.return:
The internal object representation of the JSON
string that was passed to the constructor

method.name: nextToken
method.description:
Returns the next token from the tokenzier reading
the JSON string

method.name: nextValidToken
method.description:
Returns the next token from the tokenizer reading
the JSON string and verifies that the token is valid.

method.name: parseArray
method.description: Attempt to parse an array.

method.name: parseObject
method.description: Attempt to parse an object.

method.name: parseValue
method.description: Attempt to parse a value

field.name: strict
field.description:
Flag indicating if the parser should be strict about the format
of the JSON string it is attempting to decode.

field.name: token
field.description: The current token from the tokenizer

field.name: tokenizer
field.description: The tokenizer designated to read the JSON string

field.name: value
field.description: The value that will get parsed from the JSON string

method.name: JSONToken
method.description: Creates a new JSONToken with a specific token type and value.
method.param: type The JSONTokenType of the token
value The value of the token

method.name: create
method.description:
Factory method to create instances. Because we don't need more than one instance
of a token at a time, we can always use the same instance to improve performance
and reduce memory consumption during decoding.

field.name: token
field.description: Reusable token instance.

field.name: type
field.description: The type of the token.

field.name: value
field.description: The value of the token

method.name: JSONTokenizer
method.description: Constructs a new JSONDecoder to parse a JSON string into a native object.
method.param: s The JSON string to be converted into a native object

method.name: getNextToken
method.description: Gets the next token in the input sting and advances the character to the next character after the token

method.name: isDigit
method.description: Determines if a character is a digit [0-9].
method.return: True if the character passed in is a digit

method.name: isHexDigit
method.description: Determines if a character is a hex digit [0-9A-Fa-f].
method.return: True if the character passed in is a hex digit

method.name: isWhiteSpace
method.description: Determines if a character is whitespace or not.
method.return: True if the character passed in is a whitespace character

method.name: nextChar
method.description: Reads the next character in the input string and advances the character location.
method.return: The next character in the input string, or null if we've read past the end.

method.name: parseError
method.description: Raises a parsing error with a specified message, tacking on the error location and the original string.
method.param: message The message indicating why the error occurred

method.name: readNumber
method.description: Attempts to read a number from the input string. Places the character location at the first character after the number.
method.return: The JSONToken with the number value if a number could be read. Throws an error otherwise.

method.name: readString
method.description: Attempts to read a string from the input string. Places the character location at the first character after the string. It is assumed that ch is " before this method is called.
method.return: the JSONToken with the string value if a string could be read. Throws an error otherwise.

method.name: skipComments
method.description: Skips comments in the input string, either single-line or multi-line. Advances the character to the first position after the end of the comment.

method.name: skipIgnored
method.description: Advances the character location past any sort of white space and comments

method.name: skipWhite
method.description: Skip any whitespace in the input string and advances the character to the first character after any possible whitespace.

method.name: unescapeString
method.description: Convert all JavaScript escape characters into normal characters
method.param: input The input string to convert
method.return: Original string with escape characters replaced by real characters

field.name: ch
field.description: The current character in the JSON string during parsing

field.name: controlCharsRegExp
field.description: The regular expression used to make sure the string does not contain invalid control characters.

field.name: jsonString
field.description: The JSON string to be parsed

field.name: loc
field.description: The current parsing location in the JSON string

field.name: obj
field.description: The object that will get parsed from the JSON string

field.name: strict
field.description: Flag indicating if the tokenizer should only recognize standard JSON tokens. Setting to false allows tokens such as NaN and allows numbers to be formatted as hex, etc.

method.name: JSONParseError
method.description: Constructs a new JSONParseError.
method.param: message The error message that occured during parsing

method.name: location
method.description: Provides read-only access to the location variable.
method.return: The location in the string where the error occurred

method.name: text
method.description: Provides read-only access to the text variable.
method.return: The string in which the error occurred

field.name: _location
field.description: The location in the string where the error occurred

field.name: _text
field.description: The string in which the parse error occurred

method.name: JSONEncoder
method.description: Creates a new JSONEncoder.
method.param: o The object to encode as a JSON string

method.name: arrayToString
method.description: Converts an array to it's JSON string equivalent

method.name: convertToString
method.description: Converts a value to it's JSON string equivalent.
method.param:
value The value to convert. Could be any
type (object, number, array, etc)

method.name: escapeString
method.description: Escapes a string accoding to the JSON specification.
method.param: str The string to be escaped
method.return:
The string with escaped special characters
according to the JSON specification

method.name: getString
method.description: Gets the JSON string from the encoder.
method.return:
The JSON string representation of the object
that was passed to the constructor

method.name: objectToString
method.description: Converts an object to it's JSON string equivalent

field.name: jsonString
field.description: The string that is going to represent the object we're encoding

field.description: GetFromCache attribute name

field.name: SERIALIZE_PARTIAL_ELEMENT

method.name: useOwnerAlias
method.description: Get a flag to signal wether to use the owner's alias or not
method.return: true if it must use the owner's alias, false otherwise

field.description: private

classRec.name: JSONVersionExtractor
classRec.description:
This class is used to determine the version of an incoming document. The version is considerent consistent throughout the entire document and as such the engine will extract it once per received document. By default, the version extractor searches for an attribute named "version".
If you require another kind of processing for versions you should extend this class and override the getVersion method which returns a String and accepts the xml document as source
classRec.author: Alexutz

method.name: JSONVersionExtractor
method.description: Constructor

method.name: getVersion
method.description:
Method that returns the version string located in the source document. Override this
method to implement different extraction algorithms.
method.return: string value representing the document's version

field.name: getResponseTypeByName
field.description:
Determine the type of the object the response will be deserialised into
by the name associated with the value in the parent.

field.name: strict
field.description: Flag indicating if the decoder should strictly adhere to the JSON standard or not. The default of true throws errors if the format does not match the JSON syntax exactly. Pass false to allow for non-properly-formatted JSON strings to be decoded with more leniancy.
